name: Fluor Corporation
description: Fluor Corporation is a global engineering and construction firm that provides integrated solutions to clients in various industries, including oil and gas, industrial, infrastructure, and government sectors. Founded in 1912 and headquartered in Irving, Texas, Fluor has built a reputation for delivering complex projects on time and within budget, leveraging advanced technologies and innovative project management strategies. The company operates through several segments, including Oil & Gas, Industrial & Infrastructure, and Government, serving clients around the world. Fluor's commitment to sustainability is evident through its focus on environmental stewardship, safety, and social responsibility, as well as its investments in renewable energy projects. With a workforce that spans across continents, Fluor combines local knowledge with global expertise to tackle some of the most challenging engineering and construction tasks, from refineries and power plants to transportation systems and military bases. The company aims to be the world's most admired engineering and construction firm by delivering exceptional value to its clients and fostering a culture of integrity and innovation.
